Name: ``e^theta*sqrt(g)``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{e}^{\theta} \sqrt{g}`
Description: Contravariant poloidal basis vector weighted by 3-D volume Jacobian

Name: ``n_rho``
Label: :math:`\hat{\mathbf{n}}_{\rho}`
Description: Unit vector normal to constant rho surface (direction of e^rho)

Name: ``n_theta``
Label: :math:`\hat{\mathbf{n}}_{\theta}`
Description: Unit vector normal to constant theta surface (direction of e^theta)

Name: ``n_zeta``
Label: :math:`\hat{\mathbf{n}}_{\zeta}`
Description: Unit vector normal to constant zeta surface (direction of e^zeta)

Name: ``V``
Label: :math:`V`
Description: Volume

Name: ``S``
Label: :math:`S`
Description: Surface area of outermost flux surface

Name: ``L_sff_rho``
Label: :math:`L_{\mathrm{SFF},\rho}`
Description: L coefficient of second fundamental form of constant rho surface

Name: ``M_sff_rho``
Label: :math:`M_{\mathrm{SFF},\rho}`
Description: M coefficient of second fundamental form of constant rho surface

Name: ``N_sff_rho``
Label: :math:`N_{\mathrm{SFF},\rho}`
Description: N coefficient of second fundamental form of constant rho surface

Name: ``curvature_k1_rho``
Label: :math:`k_{1,\rho}`
Description: First principle curvature of constant rho surfaces

Name: ``curvature_k2_rho``
Label: :math:`k_{2,\rho}`
Description: Second principle curvature of constant rho surfaces

Name: ``curvature_K_rho``
Label: :math:`K_{\rho}`
Description: Gaussian curvature of constant rho surfaces

Name: ``curvature_H_rho``
Label: :math:`H_{\rho}`
Description: Mean curvature of constant rho surfaces

Name: ``|e_theta x e_zeta|``
Label: :math:`|\mathbf{e}_{\theta} \times \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant rho surface

Name: ``|e_theta x e_zeta|_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} |\mathbf{e}_{\theta} \times \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant rho surface derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``|e_theta x e_zeta|_rr``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho\rho} |\mathbf{e}_{\theta} \times \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant rho surface second derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``|e_zeta x e_rho|``
Label: :math:`|\mathbf{e}_{\zeta} \times \mathbf{e}_{\rho}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant theta surface

Name: ``|e_rho x e_theta|``
Label: :math:`|\mathbf{e}_{\rho} \times \mathbf{e}_{\theta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant zeta surface

Name: ``|e_rho x e_theta|_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} |\mathbf{e}_{\rho} \times \mathbf{e}_{\theta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant zeta surface derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``|e_rho x e_theta|_rr``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho \rho} |\mathbf{e}_{\rho} \times \mathbf{e}_{\theta}|`
Description: 2D Jacobian determinant for constant zeta surface second derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``g_rr``
Label: :math:`g_{\rho\rho}`
Description: Radial/Radial element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_tt``
Label: :math:`g_{\theta\theta}`
Description: Poloidal/Poloidal element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_zz``
Label: :math:`g_{\zeta\zeta}`
Description: Toroidal/Toroidal element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_rt``
Label: :math:`g_{\rho\theta}`
Description: Radial/Poloidal element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_rz``
Label: :math:`g_{\rho\zeta}`
Description: Radial/Toroidal element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_tz``
Label: :math:`g_{\theta\zeta}`
Description: Poloidal/Toroidal element of covariant metric tensor

Name: ``g_tt_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} g_{\theta\theta}`
Description: Poloidal/Poloidal element of covariant metric tensor, derivative wrt rho

Name: ``g_tz_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} g_{\theta\zeta}`
Description: Poloidal/Toroidal element of covariant metric tensor, derivative wrt rho

Name: ``x``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{r}`
Description: Position vector along surface

Name: ``R``
Label: :math:`R`
Description: Cylindrical radial position along surface

Name: ``phi``
Label: :math:`\phi`
Description: Toroidal phi position along surface

Name: ``Z``
Label: :math:`Z`
Description: Cylindrical vertical position along surface

Name: ``e_rho``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{e}_{\rho}`
Description: Covariant radial basis vector

Name: ``e_theta``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{e}_{\theta}`
Description: Covariant poloidal basis vector

Name: ``e_zeta``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{e}_{\zeta}`
Description: Covariant toroidal basis vector

Name: ``e_rho_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} \mathbf{e}_{\rho}`
Description: Covariant radial basis vector, derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_rho_rr``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho \rho} \mathbf{e}_{\rho}`
Description: Covariant radial basis vector, second derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_rho_t``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\theta} \mathbf{e}_{\rho}`
Description: Covariant radial basis vector, derivative wrt poloidal angle

Name: ``e_rho_z``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\zeta} \mathbf{e}_{\rho}`
Description: Covariant radial basis vector, derivative wrt toroidal angle

Name: ``e_theta_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} \mathbf{e}_{\theta}`
Description: Covariant poloidal basis vector, derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_theta_rr``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho \rho} \mathbf{e}_{\theta}`
Description: Covariant poloidal basis vector, second derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_theta_t``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\theta} \mathbf{e}_{\theta}`
Description: Covariant poloidal basis vector, derivative wrt poloidal angle

Name: ``e_theta_z``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\zeta} \mathbf{e}_{\theta}`
Description: Covariant poloidal basis vector, derivative wrt toroidal angle

Name: ``e_zeta_r``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho} \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}`
Description: Covariant toroidal basis vector, derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_zeta_rr``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\rho \rho} \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}`
Description: Covariant toroidal basis vector, second derivative wrt radial coordinate

Name: ``e_zeta_t``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\theta} \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}`
Description: Covariant toroidal basis vector, derivative wrt poloidal angle

Name: ``e_zeta_z``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\zeta} \mathbf{e}_{\zeta}`
Description: Covariant toroidal basis vector, derivative wrt toroidal angle

Name: ``Phi``
Label: :math:`\Phi`
Description: Surface current potential

Name: ``Phi_t``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\theta}\Phi`
Description: Surface current potential, poloidal derivative

Name: ``Phi_z``
Label: :math:`\partial_{\zeta}\Phi`
Description: Surface current potential, toroidal derivative

Name: ``K``
Label: :math:`\mathbf{K}`
Description: Surface current density, defined as thesurface normal vector cross the gradient of the current potential.
